data.title: Top Pharmaceuticals companies In Latvia

Top Pharmaceuticals companies In Latvia's phone number
data.meta_description: Pharmaceutical companies in Latvia are responsible for the development, production, and distribution of pharmaceutical products in the country. These companies are involved in the research and development of new drugs, as well as in the manufacturing of medications and medical devices. Some of the major pharmaceutical companies in Latvia include Grindeks, Olainfarm, and Silvanols. These companies focus on producing medications for cardiovascular diseases, nervous system disorders, and gastrointestinal diseases, among others. The pharmaceutical industry in Latvia is regulated by the State Agency of Medicines, which ensures that pharmaceutical products meet quality and safety standards.
